availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Carlisle and Asneath Potifer Twiliger Carlisle. Married Elizabeth Mendenhall Carlisle. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, Districk No. 2, p. 203. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 68. Find A Grave, "Samuel Stebbins Carlisle (1820 - 1915)," Memorial #12744508, https://findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=12744508 (accessed May 17, 2017).
